Definition: Standard measure of conduction through a material. This value applies to the glazing portion of the wall only.
Shading effect of the glass. A value between 0 and 1. Not to be confused with the solar heat gain coefficient which is equivalent to the shading coefficient x 0.87.
Used to calculate glass area. Percent of façade taken up by glazing.
Optional field to specify fixed dimensions of Window. Percent wall area is not applied when dimensions specified.
